meanings.definition: A person who has an extreme fear of germs.
meanings.sent1: Germophobes always carry hand sanitizer with them.
meanings.sent2: My friends are germophobes and always wash their hands before eating.
meanings.sent3: The germophobes in the office have a collection of colorful hand sanitizers.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a germophobe spread through the school like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The germophobes in the family refuse to share drinks with anyone.

meanings.sent1: We invited all the germophobes to the hygiene seminar.
meanings.sent2: The germophobes gathered to discuss the best ways to stay clean.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the germophobes joked about forming a germ-free club.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with germophobes, each armed with their own disinfectant wipes.
meanings.sent5: The germophobes' convention was a sea of white gloves and face masks.
